name: SATYA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: REGISTERED IN KARNAL, HARYANA IN 2008 UNDER SOCIETIES ACT 1980, SATYA FOUNDATION IS FORMED BY A GROUP OF YOUNG PROFESSIONALS AND SMALL ENTREPRENEUR'S WITH A MOTTO TO SERVE PEOPLE IN NEED SPECIALLY IN RURAL AREAS. WE HAVE BEEN WORKING IN PROVIDING AWARENESS IN THE FIELD OF EDUCATION, HEALTH & SANITATION, ENVIRONMENT, UTILIZATION OF INDUSTRIAL WASTE, WATER CONSERVATION, POVERTY ERADICATION, USE OF CERTIFIED SEED, INNOVATIVE WAYS OF FARMING, YOUTH AND WOMEN EMPOWERMENT. OUR WORK HAS BEEN APPRECIATED BY GOVT. OF HARYANA, ROTARY CLUB, LION CLUB AND OTHER INSTITUTIONS OF REPUTE.
